name: German Language for MLD Newsletter plugin
description:
Provides the german translation for the MLD-Newsletter PlugIn vers. 0.8. in the polite form of address.

Die Sprachdatei stellt die deutsche Übersetzung für das MLD-Newsletter PlugIn in der Höflichkeitsform zur Verfügung.

version 0.3 fixes some spelling mistakes

Version 0.3 behebt kleinere Rechtschreibfehler.

version 0.2 fixed problems with the german umlauts and now provides the polite form of adress and the casual form of adress.

Version 0.2 behebt die Probleme mit den Umlauten und stell nun sowohl die Sie Form als auch die Du-Form zur Verfügung.

name: Greek Language
description:
This is the Greek language file for GetSimple 3.2.3. I took the older translation made by kiriakos118, changed a few things and put some missing translations as well. I'll do my best to update it when new versions are released.

Changelog:
v0.1.2:
- Translated some remaining untranslated lines
- Corrected some typos
- Improved some translation strings 

v0.1:
Added the latest translations for 3.2.3

Disclaimer: I am not a professional translator, and since the original translation was not made by me, I can't guarantee it is prefect. I'll be updating this file as I progress in making the translation better than it is. Use this file on your own responsibility.

name: Hungarian lang file for GS and CKEditor
tags: hungarian, hu, hun, language, translation, getsimple, ckeditor
description:
Hungarian translation for GS 3.3.5+ and CKEditor.

A csomag két fájlt tartalmaz:

1. **hu_HU.php** - a GetSimple nyelvi fájljának frissítése és a kimaradt szövegek fordítása.
2. **hu.js** - a CKEditor 3.6.2 (a szövegszerkeszt? az oldalakhoz) magyar nyelvi fájlja. Forrás: <http://dev.ckeditor.com/browser/CKEditor/trunk/_source/lang/hu.js?rev=7096>

name: German language
description:
German language file for GetSimple.

This translation was initially based on [German Language File GS 3.3 ](http://get-simple.info/extend/language/german-language-file-gs-33/762/).

Changes:

* Fixed various spelling errors
* Improved various translations, punctuation and formatting
* More conventional date formats
* Proper quotes, ellipses, etc.
* Cleaned up and reformatted language file, allowing easier maintenance in the future

Dit Nederlandse-taalbestand is bestemd voor de Admin-zijde van GetSimple.
Het mag door iedereen worden gebruikt. Ook mag het door iedereen naar eigen inzichten worden gewijzigd.

Veel plezier ermee. :-))
